name: "Series Two, Study no. 7: Nuts in Love"- Mixed media.
description:
"Series Two, Study no. 7: Nuts in Love"-Mixed media, is available in A4-A1.

(This piece came from a serendipitous event when a walnut was cracked open to reveal two heart-shaped walnuts inside-to celebrate it, a low-relief sculpture was created by placing a small yellow wax heart behind the nuts combined with good lighting, helped create this image to celebrate this inspiring find). Will make you smile guaranteed!

A4-£15.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 8 and 3/4 inches).

A3-£30.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 16 and 3/4 inches).

A2-£45.00 (measures 16 inches x 24 inches).

A1-£75.00 (measures 24 inches x 36 inches). 

Strangford Lough Gallery (SLG) sells and exhibits prints of artwork by artists from Northern Ireland, Europe. There are 6 series or themes of SLG prints available and all prints are limited editions of 900 (they are numbered and named on back of the image). The prints are not framed or in mounts, to keep the P & P costs low and are mailed in tubes/rolls.

name: "Series Six, Study no. 5: The Farmyard Series/ Lifecycle"/ Painting.
description:
"Series Six, Study no. 5: The Farmyard Series/ Lifecycle"/ Painting, is available in A4-A1.

(This print is of a large acrylic painting depicting the lifecycle of animals on the farm. It has stylised animals living within various karmic cycles and is part of a double-sided, free-standing painting installation but the second side isn't shown here).

name: "Series Six, Study no. 2: Silver Spiral/ view 2"- Sculpture.
description:
"Series Six, Study no. 2: Silver Spiral Sculpture/ view 2",
is available in A4-A1.

(This is a metal sculpture installation piece that is made of 93 sand-cast Aluminium "stones". The stones are moved around to create new forms as seen this 'Silver Spiral Sculpture/ view 2' image. The original stone was found in a beach and a mold was made of its form and then re-cast to create a master-template in order to do multiple metal castings totalling 93 "stones").

A4-£15.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 8 and 3/4 inches).

A3-£30.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 16 and 3/4 inches).

A2-£45.00 (measures 16 inches x 24 inches).

A1-£75.00 (measures 24 inches x 36 inches). 

Strangford Lough Gallery (SLG) sells and exhibits prints of artwork by artists from Northern Ireland, Europe. The prints are not framed or in mounts, to keep the P & P costs low and are mailed in tubes/rolls.

is available in A4-A1.

(Late Pagan/Early  Christian grave statue called a "Janiform" (two sided Statue), is on White island, Lough Erne, Co. Fermanagh, N. Ireland. This is the third collage of the Janiform statue; emphasising the sides as well as the front of the form).

"Series Four, Study no. 5: Autumn Window into Winter",

(Taken during an early Autumn morning after a freak overnight snowfall. Autumn foliage looks into a steep forest dell covered in snow; a magical picture of two seasons colliding).

name: "Series Four, Study no. 4: Low Tide at Cross Island Causeway",
description:
"Series Four, Study no. 4: Low Tide at Cross Island Causeway",
is available in A4-A1.

(Cross Island meets Reagh Island at the causeway intersection. A causeway is a permanent narrow road, sometimes with low walls, that cuts through the water during tidal activity. High Tides however cover the roads and causeways completely so waiting for 1-2 hours is a compulsory until the tides lower sufficiently for a safe crossing). 

A4-£15.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 8 and 3/4 inches).

A3-£30.00 (measures 11 and 3/4 inches x 16 and 3/4 inches).

description:
"Series Three, Study no. 1: Reagh Island Sunset",

(After the small volcano blew up in Iceland a few years ago, the dust travelled all over Europe and stayed in the atmosphere for months, creating the most beautiful sunrises and sunsets over Strangford Lough. This sunset was photographed between Comber and Greyabbey, on the Ards Peninsula).
